block.comment: Retrieve list of latest deployments from target environment

block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Get Latest Package Version

input.code:
pipeline_config_id = ""
package_version = ""
deployment_details = input['deployment_details']
latest_deployment = deployment_details.where('pipeline_config_id !=': nil).sort_by {|x| (x[:deployed_on].to_time)}.last

if latest_deployment.present?
  pipeline_config_id = latest_deployment[:pipeline_config_id]
  package_version = latest_deployment[:package_version]
  deployed_on = latest_deployment[:deployed_on]
end

{ pipeline_config_id: pipeline_config_id, package_version: package_version, deployed_on: deployed_on }
input.name: Get Latest Package Version

block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Get Latest Packages

input.code:
pipeline_config_id = ""
package_version = ""
last_version_deployed_to_target = input['last_version_deployed_to_target']
deployment_details = input['deployment_details']

if last_version_deployed_to_target.present?
  packages_list = deployment_details.where('pipeline_config_id !=': nil, 'package_version >': last_version_deployed_to_target).sort_by { |x| x[:package_version] }
else
  packages_list = deployment_details.where('pipeline_config_id !=': nil).sort_by { |x| x[:deployed_on].to_time }
end

latest_deployment = deployment_details.where('pipeline_config_id !=': nil).sort_by { |x| x[:deployed_on].to_time }.last

if latest_deployment.present?
  pipeline_config_id = latest_deployment[:pipeline_config_id]
  package_version = latest_deployment[:package_version]
end

{ packages_list: packages_list, latest_package_version: package_version }
input.name: Get Latest Packages

block.name: post_blocks_message
block.description: Post message to user as Workbot

choice_set_input.label: Package Version
choice_set_input.hint: =_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_custom_code","line":"38a2d0c2","path":["output","packages_list",{"path_element_type":"size"}]}') > 0 ? "Select the package version to promote (Latest version: " + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_custom_code","line":"38a2d0c2","path":["output","latest_package_version"]}') + ")" : "There are no new packages to deploy!"

action_submit.title: =_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_custom_code","line":"38a2d0c2","path":["output","packages_list",{"path_element_type":"size"}]}') > 0 ? "Submit" : ""
action_submit.params: command: collect_pipeline_execution replace_message: true param1: process_data param2: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"190d1480","path":["parameters","merged_data"]}')}

text_block.text: =_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_custom_code","line":"695d419c","path":["output","pipeline_config_id"]}').present? ? (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_custom_code","line":"695d419c","path":["output","pipeline_config_id"]}') != _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"json_parser","line":"c1a6048e","path":["document","promote_config"]}') ? "\u{2757}" : "\u{2705}") + " Last deployment was done by pipeline **#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"lookup_table","line":"b7c1c4af","path":["entries",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"entry","col4"]}')}** with version **#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_custom_code","line":"695d419c","path":["output","package_version"]}')}**" : ""

=_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_custom_code","line":"695d419c","path":["output","pipeline_config_id"]}').present? ? (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_custom_code","line":"695d419c","path":["output","pipeline_config_id"]}') != _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"json_parser","line":"c1a6048e","path":["document","pipeline_config_id"]}') ? "\u{26A0}" : "\u{2705}") + " Last deployment was done by pipeline **#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"lookup_table","line":"b7c1c4af","path":["entries",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"entry","col4"]}')}** with version **#{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_custom_code","line":"695d419c","path":["output","package_version"]}')}**" : "\u{2705} No previous deployments found."
